attributes.action: CONDUCT A PUBLIC INQUIRY into why HMRC relentlessly pursues the poor for pennies in unpaid taxes while letting off the rich with hundreds of millions.
attributes.additional_details: More stories about yet another multi billionaire being given a 'sweet' deal by HMRC.  The public need to know just how much HMRC personnel are being sweetened, personally, to prevent pursuance of HUGE amounts in unpaid taxes by the rich and their companies, while the taxed poor are being charged interest on the piffling (by comparison) amounts they are being relentlessly chased for.
